Traits.Name: Defiance
Traits.Description: Prevents hit points from being reduced past 1 hp. When this triggers, remove this effect.

Traits.Name: Great Shelter
Traits.Description: Adjacent allies gain +1 boon on saves. At the start of the archpriestâ€™s turn, all adjacent allies can cleanse a blight, end a status, or clear a mark.

Actions.Name: Autocure
Actions.Description: May grant vigor 1 to a bloodied ally in range 3.

Actions.Name: Great Holy
Actions.Effect: Foes inside must save or be staggered.

Actions.Name: Seal
Actions.Description: A foe in range 5 must save or become pacified and slow.

Actions.Name: Punishment
Actions.Description: A foe in range 4 must save or become staggered. If already staggered, they become stunned.

Actions.Name: Immaculate
Actions.Description: An ally in range 5 becomes Intangible to foes until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Gran Succor
Actions.Description: All defeated characters in range 3 are returned with the summon type and 25% hp. They can act as normal starting with the next round.
